briefdescription.para: Function for returning the specified PPIB SEND task.
Function for returning the specified PPIB RECEIVE event.
Function for setting the subscribe configuration for a given task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task for which to set the configuration.
DPPI channel through which to subscribe events.

briefdescription.para: Function for clearing the subscribe configuration for a given task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task for which to clear the configuration.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the publish configuration for a given event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event for which to set the configuration.
DPPI channel through which to publish the event.

briefdescription.para: Function for clearing the publish configuration for a given event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event for which to clear the configuration.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the task oveflow register for SEND tasks. Task overflow mask is cleared after reading.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: Mask of SEND tasks overflow, constructed with nrf_ppib_send_mask_t.

briefdescription.para: Function for retrieving the state of overflow for a given SEND task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
SEND task index to be checked for overflow.
